about_the_game:
A Yandere experience through a Live2D full animation and 360-degree panoramic exploration.
There isn't a single moment without movement.
A glimpse into forbidden dark obsession — something only indie games can dare to achieve.

【STORY】



You awaken in an unfamiliar room, your memory lost—only to discover that your limbs have been severed.
A one-armed man, known as the "Limb-Severing Devil", calls you by a name you don’t recognize and treats you like his lover.



The very person who took your limbs now offers devoted care—but one wrong move could mean death...
Caught between terror and Stockholm syndrome, your life in this deadly game of captivity has begun.

【Live Game Streaming and Fan Art Guidelines】

"Severed Love" welcomes game distribution and fan art!
I welcome both individuals and corporations to distribute and monetize their work without permission.
The story can be distributed until the end of the story, but I plan to limit the completion of some of the collected content.
When submitting videos, please include the name of the game and a link to the official website or Steam store page.
When submitting fan art, I would appreciate it if you could clearly state the name of the work and use the hashtag #欠損失愛

【SYSTEM】



Losing your limbs and bound by a collar, you cannot even walk around and explore.
You must look around the panorama, point-click to observe, and look for clues that will help you gain the favor of the Limb-Severing Devil.
However, it is essential that you conviced the dismemberment demon into helping you read even a single book on the bookshelf.



In conversations with the Yandere man, simply acting obediently may not always work.
You can punch him with a punch of truth, filled with hatred, or spew insults endlessly.
There’s no need to feel guilty because he’s a the bad guy.
The Limb-Severing Devil will serve you "to the limit" no matter what you ask.



The story has multiple endings, including dozens of dead endings that allow you to enjoy various ways to die.
The more you die, the more the character of the Limb-Severing Devil will be explored with "keywords" that you can obtain each time you meet a dead end.
This is a roller-coaster adventure game of drama as you fear his unexpected reactions, bond with him, and sometimes throw in a punchline.



In the Japanese version, you can select or freely input the protagonist's first-person pronoun.
In the non-Japanese localized versions, you can choose which gender you want to be perceived as.
The gender of the main character is not stated in the work, so please enjoy the game as you imagine it.



Shocking descriptions, such as body loss, can be made milder through the settings.

【CHARACTER】



〈Limb-Severing Devil (LSD)〉
He is a bizarre criminal who amputates your limbs and takes care of you in captivity and devotedly.
He calls you by the name of a woman he does not know and acts like a lover.
A one-armed man himself, he wears a creepy prosthetic hand with bright red nail polish and a warped obsession with missing.
He is cool and decadent, but he can be clumsy when he talks about his lover.
He is unsure whether to "end" his life of incarcerated caregiving and is in a dangerous terminal stage of depression that could dispose of you if triggered.



〈You〉
The main character is missing limbs and has amnesia.
You are unable to live even your daily life due to the lack of limbs, and you need the care of the Limb-Severing Devil to survive.
If the Limb-Severing Devil dies first, you can do nothing but starve to death.

【Q&A】

Q. Is this an Otome game?
A. Yes, it is. However, it can be enjoyed by all genders.
While the game features a single male love interest, the focus is not on spoiled romance but on delivering a deeply immersive experience through full Live2D animation.

Conversations with the yandere male may often feel disjointed, cryptic, surreal, or unsettling.

Players can find enjoyment in different ways, whether it's:
- Analyzing the story,
- Appreciating the gender-ambiguous “dismembered protaganist”as they endure cruel fates,
- Or laughing at the dark absurdity of it all.

Designed with gameplay streaming in mind, this title offers plenty of moments to react to, theorize about, or humorously comment on.

Q. Is this game fully voiced?
A. The demo version (episode 1) will be fully voiced. I am working on implementing more voices in the production version as well, so your encouragement would be appreciated!
The main character will have no voice, and the voice of the Limb-Stripping Man will be in Japanese only.

Q. How much horror is portrayed?
A. This game includes jumpscare effects such as turning around and encountering a yandere, sudden silence, etc.
No realistic monster graphics, loud screams, or other extreme effects.
(If you're okay with the game that this work is paying homage to, you should be fine!)

Q. Is there metafiction or time leap?
A. This title is not a time-lapse story, but there may be a small reason why you can carry over "memories" in the form of save data.
It is not the main part of the story, so we do not recommend that you purchase this game expecting metafiction.

Q. How much gore is depicted?
A. Contains shocking depictions of bodily defects and suicides.
No direct gore, such as bloody mutilations.
Shocking descriptions, such as body loss, can be made milder through changing the game settings.

Q. How much sexuality is depicted?
A. Limb-Severing Devil is a chaste man who is not fond of vulgarity.
If you develop a twisted codependence with him, you may be able to play a prank on him.

Q. How is it related to the game "Romp of Dump" by the same developer?
A. "Severed Love" is the story of a different world line from "Romp of Dump", a Visual novel of Examination of Despicable Prisoners.
If you are new to the game, play "Severed Love" without prior information for maximum surprise!
If you play "Romp of Dump" after finishing the game, you will have an even better experience with the scum episode of the Limb-Severing Devil!

【CREDIT】

Voice Actor
  • Limb-Severing Devil: Coming Soon!

Designer
  • Title Logo Design：Sonoda

Steam Store Page Translation
  • English Proofreading: Leo BERTIN, Erin LAVAUX (Tawaci™️ Media).
  • Simplified Chinese & Traditional Chinese: flankoi

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains shocking depictions of bodily defects and suicides.
No direct gore, such as bloody mutilations.
Shocking descriptions, such as body loss, can be made milder through the settings.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11, 12, 13, 14
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel® Core ™ i5 or more
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon RX 460
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11, 12, 13, 14
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel® Core ™ i7 or more
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 570
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Severed Love

  • Processor: Intel® Core ™ i5 or more

  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10, 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core ™ i7 or more
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: You have lost both your legs and arms and you can’t remember anything... The Limb-Severing Devil's Confinement and Devotion. Your only way to survive... Pretend to be his lover,〈Live2D × PARANORMASIGHT-like × Psycho-Horror Romance Adventure〉
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
